title: LocalUP
description: Local-UP is designed to be a project management system with 3 portals (Clients/Admins/Devs). It will help fresh devs to work together on building websites and other e-services for local businesses.
techs: MERN application built with MongoDB, JWT, react, React-Reveal, axios, and bootstrap. Supports multiple user types and resource/permission management
guestAccount: For Admins portal: (username: samerss pw: 12345678), For Clients portal: (username: client1 pw: 12345678)

title: Santa's Bag
description: This app will ease your gifts shopping process during the holiday season. You can add all your loved ones and specify a budget for each one and the app will help you find the right gift/s along with managing your overall budget.
techs: MySQL, Node.JS, JS, jQuery, Bootstrap and materialize, CSS, Sequelize, Express, Passport, Bcryptjs, Dotenv, Amazon Product/Reviews/Keywords API.

title: Whales Tracker
description: The app is designed to track whales sighting data and other marine life by location. The user can get some basic info about the species as well.
techs: Javascript, HTML, CSS, Google Maps API, Geocoder API, Whalemuseum API

title: Weather Application
description: Search for a city in the U.S. get current weather and 5 days forecast for that city. All searched cities are stored in localStorage and the last one entered witll be on screen.
techs: Javascript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,openweathermap API.

title: Burgerify
description: Add burgers to the list and devour burgers from the list to add them the Global Belly (MySql DB).
techs: MVC design using Express, Node, Handlebars, MySQL and topped with ORM sauce.

alt: screenshot of Offline Budget Tracker project
title: Offline Budget Tracker
description: This Progressive Web Application (PWA) utilizes IndexDB and service workers to work offline and be installable as stand-alone chrome app. The UI is simple, you can 'add funds' or 'subtract funds' and the app will keep track of your transactions and your total budget. All the functionalities work offline as well.
techs: MongoDB, Mongoose, Node.JS, JS, Express, IndexDB, PWA
